performance_metrics.name: Throughput (Units/Hour)
performance_metrics.description: The number of individual items processed (receiving, picking, packing, shipping) per hour. Dependent on SKU complexity, order size, and system efficiency.

performance_metrics.name: Order Fulfillment Rate
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of orders fulfilled completely and accurately, without errors or omissions.  A critical measure of operational efficiency.

performance_metrics.name: Pick Accuracy Rate
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of picked items that match the order requirements. High accuracy minimizes returns and rework.

performance_metrics.name: Cycle Time (Picking)
performance_metrics.description: Average time taken to pick a single order.  Influenced by picking technology, system layout, and operator efficiency.

performance_metrics.name: Storage Utilization
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of warehouse space occupied by stored inventory. Optimizing storage density is crucial for cost-effectiveness.

performance_metrics.name: Dock-to-Stock Cycle Time
performance_metrics.description: The time from receiving goods at the dock to making them available for picking.  Key factor in supply chain responsiveness.

implementation_requirements.name: Warehouse Management System (WMS)
implementation_requirements.specification: Real-time inventory tracking, order management, task assignment, reporting.  Integration with ERP and TMS.
implementation_requirements.description: A robust WMS is the central control system, managing all warehouse operations.

implementation_requirements.name: Automated Guided Vehicle (AGV) System
implementation_requirements.specification: Minimum 3 AGVs for a 10,000 sq ft facility;  Payload capacity of 500 lbs per AGV; Operating speed of 1.5-3 mph.
implementation_requirements.description: AGVs automate material movement within the warehouse, improving efficiency and reducing labor costs.

implementation_requirements.name: Conveyor System
implementation_requirements.specification: Minimum 2 conveyor lines for a 10,000 sq ft facility;  Belt speed of 100-200 ft/min;  Maximum conveyor length of 300 ft.
implementation_requirements.description: Conveyor systems automate the movement of goods between workstations.

implementation_requirements.name: Picking Technology
implementation_requirements.specification: Voice picking, RF scanning, or pick-to-light with 99% accuracy.
implementation_requirements.description: Accurate and efficient order fulfillment necessitates the right picking technology.

implementation_requirements.name: Rack System
implementation_requirements.specification: Selective racking, Pallet racking, or Flow racking depending on SKU profile - Adjustable shelving to accommodate variations in product dimensions.
implementation_requirements.description: Optimized racking maximizes storage density and facilitates efficient retrieval.

implementation_requirements.name: Integration with ERP/TMS
implementation_requirements.specification: API-based integration for seamless data exchange.
implementation_requirements.description: Essential for real-time visibility across the entire supply chain.

industry_standards: ERS – European Warehouse Logistics Association Standards
operational_considerations: Warehouse Layout Optimization: Utilize ABC analysis to position frequently accessed items closer to packing stations.
Labor Training: Comprehensive training programs for all personnel on new equipment and processes.
Preventative Maintenance: Implement a robust maintenance schedule for all automated equipment.
Safety Protocols: Strict adherence to safety regulations and procedures.
Data Analytics: Continuous monitoring and analysis of key performance indicators (KPIs) to identify areas for improvement.
Scalability: Design the system with future expansion in mind.
Redundancy: Plan for equipment redundancy to minimize downtime.
Energy Efficiency: Utilize energy-efficient lighting and HVAC systems.

input.system_message: You are an AI assistant specialized in industrial engineering and specifications. For the given topic, provide a comprehensive overview of industrial/commercial specifications including performance metrics and implementation requirements. Be precise with numerical values and include ranges where appropriate. Focus on practical technical details that would be relevant to professionals in the field.
input.user_message:
Create detailed industrial specifications for: Automated Warehousing

Format your response as a JSON object with these categories:
1. performance_metrics: An array of metrics with names, values/ranges, and descriptions
2. implementation_requirements: An array of requirements with names, specifications, and descriptions
3. industry_standards: An array of relevant standards and certifications
4. key_suppliers: An array of major equipment/technology suppliers for this industry
5. operational_considerations: An array of important operational factors

Please provide realistic values for industrial/commercial scale implementations.

Return ONLY valid JSON without any additional text, explanation, or code block formatting.
